title: LAGGERS !!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
Hey Riot,

How about greying out the "PLAY" button for people with over....i don't know 1000 ping !?!?!?!?!

This ruins the game for people 

Sincerely,
F**KING OVER IT !!!!

replies.body: But some people have random spikes which are unpredictable and they really can't do anything about it, I usually have a solid 30 ms but sometimes it randomly goes over 500 for a few seconds.
